elements.text: During a difficult visit to the dentist, you have a hard time staying still. You start to worry this restlessness could be a sign of HD progressing. Later, your partner reminds you that lots of people get fidgety when they are...

elements.name: Dentist Appointment_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
